ai.summary: Crilly's Loanin is a short, easy 1.3 km hike in the UK. The exact region isn't specified, but the trail offers a straightforward, beginner-friendly route and a quick outdoor escape suitable for families and first-time hikers.
ai.terrain_summary: Predominantly flat and well-marked paths with easy underfoot conditions. Expect occasional grass or compact earth sections; surfaces are generally gentle and suitable for casual footwear.
ai.safety_notes: Always check the weather and daylight hours before you go. Wear sturdy footwear and bring a light layer plus rain protection. Stay on marked paths, follow local rules, and supervise children or pets. Carry water, a charged phone, and let someone know your plan and expected return time.
recommended_gear: Comfortable walking shoes or lightweight hiking shoes
Map or offline navigation on a smartphone
Snack and basic first aid items
ai.best_seasons: All year round; spring and summer offer longer daylight and more pleasant weather, while autumn can provide attractive scenery and winter visits are possible in mild conditions.
